body.name: RGTIME Shredded Memory Foam Pillows - Queen Size Set of 2,Adjustable Bed Pillows for Side Back Stomach Sleepers,Comfy Cooling Pillows for Sleeping with Washable Cover
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
FREE delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 13 hrs 38 mins
features: [ADJUSTABLE MEMORY FOAM PILLOW] Too Frim? Too soft? Too thick? Too flat? The shredded foam pillow can adjust to your personal preference for just the right balance of support and comfort. Whether you are a side, back or stomach sleeper, this pillow is for you! Enjoy the most comfortable sleep!

[Cooling Gel Pillows] The brand new shredded memory foam allows air to circulate and is softer and more breathable than integral block memory foam. Blend of 80% shredded gel memory foam and 20% microfiber, the cooling gel pillows allows hot air to escape while replacing it with fresh and cool air. Even if you twist and turn all night, this cooling bed pillow will consistently fit your neck and shoulders, allowing you to wake up refreshed!

[Bamboo-WASHABLE Cover] The memory foam pillow cover with zipper is removable and washable. The breathable cover keeps your pillow dry and provides maximum comfort. Pillowcase Material (60% Polyester, 40% Rayon Derived from Bamboo).

[Extra Filling] Unlike other pillows, our foam is manufactured brand new instead of using reused materials. If you need thicker and firmer support, we also include 0.38 pounds of additional filling(already in the package).

[Tips] Our pillow are rolled into a tube and placed in a gift box, after opening the package, please pat it well and wait for 24 hours before using it. Premium shredded foam has good resilience and our cool memory foam pillow will keep their shape. You can also dry it in the dryer to make it fluffy for a long time.
[List] King memory foam pillow set of 1, 150g extra filling, product manual.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: The pillowcase is removable and machine washable, and the pillow can be kept fluffy and comfortable in the sun on a regular basis.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Finally a good nights rest!! I didn’t have to remove any foam to shape it for positioning of my neck, good support; no bunching of the foam; soft foam; and the slight odor dissipated in one day. I washed the outer case per instructions and it didn’t shrink and kept its shape. Excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY - this is the one
reviews.reviewText: I've tried four different brands of shredded memory foam pillows from Amazon, and they are not all the same as I once believed. This one by RGTIME is the clear winner.Why it wins:- Real memory foam with decent rebound time, doesn't simply spring back right away- Consistently sized pieces, no large lumps- Soft enough for back and stomach sleep without removing a bunch of filling, comfortable to lean againstOther brands I've tried and why they aren't as good:- Homby's pillows were too firm for me with unevenly cut foam. I could feel the large chunks through the pillow and it was also stuffed with "fines", small useless pieces of foam. If you want a super firm pillow for side-sleeping, this would be a good option if you're willing to cut the larger chunks down and remove the fines.- Enerplex is decent and I slept on one of their pillows for 18 months, but it has a faster rebound time and more polyfill than the RGTIME. If you prefer a more "bouncy" soft pillow, consider this one.- Nctoberows uses horrible quality "junk" foam that had absolutely no memory. No one should ever purchase one of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fraction of the cost of COOP Home Goods pillows
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the COOP Home Goods Cool pillows a couple weeks ago. Paid $318 plus tax for two king size pillows. For the money I wanted to be impressed. I was not. Nothing special. To be fair, I might have liked them better had I added the provided extra foam, but I knew that there was not going to be anything magical about the pillows. There are lots of comparable pillows for much less on Amazon and other places. So I sent them back and after much searching and reading I settled on these pillows which cost 1/6th of the COOP.I received these pillows a few hrs ago. Initial observations are that these are very similar to the COOP, but I noticed that these pillows expanded within 30 min. It took the COOP pillows about 24 hrs. Don’t know if that is good or bad. Perhaps they will eventually break down quicker than the COOP, maybe not.Honestly , these pillows feel better (comfy, firm but soft) than the COOP ones. They do; however, have a strong odor so far. I’m sure this will go away eventually. It always does.I tried one of the pillows out briefly and it felt great. I’m hopeful. It did not lose its shape like the COOP did, and I have not added the extra foam to these pillows. Don’t think I will need it, as the loft is as high as I would like it to be. I’m looking forward to my neck issues being resolved as these pillows seem to allow proper alignment of my head, neck and spine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smelly but so comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I've been struggling for a year or so to find a pillow with the right amount of smoosh and support and I am happy to report this pillow is the winner! It smells absolutely atrocious, though. I'll be patient as I know it will fade, but it's straight nasty smelling out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Search is Over!!
reviews.reviewText: What an adventure it’s been to find the perfect pillow. I tried at least a dozen and sent them all back. Here’s what I, a side sleeper who has one pillow under my noggin, another between my knees and another I hold with my “up” arm for ballast, learned in the process:1. Everyone has different needs for their pillow and what might work well for one isn’t great for another; this is the reason reviews of the same pillow can vary widely. I usually rely heavily on reviews, but pillow reviews were confusing and a bit misleading. And a review of “Great Pillow” doesn’t really help.2. Memory foam is great, but pillows with one big chunk of memory foam seem like sofa cushions and don’t adjust as much as the manufacturers suggest. All that I tried were too thick.3. The memory foam in this pillow is thousands of good quality little pieces of foam and, most importantly, pieces can be added or removed until the best thickness and feel is achieved. I removed some pieces for my best fit.4. Adjustability of the amount of foam turned out to be the single most important feature for me.5. No need to spend over $100 for designer pillows!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dreamy Night's Sleep
reviews.reviewText: Title: A Dreamy Night's SleepI recently purchased the RGTIME Shredded Memory Foam Pillow, and it has truly transformed my sleep experience. The shredded memory foam provides the perfect balance of support and comfort, molding to the contours of my head and neck.Unlike traditional pillows, this one stays cool throughout the night, ensuring a refreshing sleep. The adjustable loft allows me to customize the pillow to my preferred height, making it suitable for various sleeping positions.The hypoallergenic cover adds an extra layer of cleanliness, and the pillow is easy to maintain. Overall, the RGTIME Shredded Memory Foam Pillow has exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a restful and rejuvenating night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent pillow, especially for the price. It did not have any odor when first opened and I was able to use it the first night. The shredded foam has a fine texture that is not lumpy and it retains it support without excessive flattening all night. The construction and materials seem to be of very good quality. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars RGtime pillows very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a long time to get me some good soft firm pillows I did 2 purchase for pillows that I end up returning !Before came I across RGTIME the minute I saw RGtime pillows I read the reviewsI knew this is the pillows am looking for I must say am not disappointed at all very happy with the price the quality very firm & soft I love them i slept like a baby I definitely recommend if you’re looking for some comfortable pillow this is it ! only regrets I have I washed the pillow covering in warm water and it became smaller than the pillows so I lost my bamboo covering for my pillows. please do not wash your covering in warm water. It’s best you Hand wash them in cold water These pillows are the best 5 stars.
